annotations.description: Today's the very first time we are using Batavia Aarack on the show. Batavia Aarack is one of the oldest spirits in existence, it is a rum style spirit made ...
annotations.title: Introducing A Brand New Spirit To The Show With The Seven Seas Swizzle

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Batavia Aarack
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Green Tea Cane Syrup
1 Dash Orange Bitters
Garnish Mint Sprigs
dehydrated Lime Wheel
Dusting of Nutmeg

Swizzle in glass or whip shake. 
Garnish with mint, lime, and nutmeg.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fb7IZ_PmytI
title: Seven Seas Swizzle
